mapper.select: SELECT b.material, sum(sl_kg) as sl_kg FROM `hte_kc_material_ck_tzd` a LEFT JOIN hte_kc_material b on a.material_id = b.id where a.check_flag = 2 and operate_date between #{fromDate} and #{toDate} group by material_id

SELECT concat(c.depart_name, b.material) as description, c.depart_name, b.material, sum(sl_kg) as sl_kg FROM `hte_kc_material_ck_tzd` a LEFT JOIN hte_kc_material b on a.material_id = b.id left join sys_depart c on c.org_code = a.site_id where a.check_flag = 2 and operate_date between #{fromDate} and #{toDate} group by depart_name, material_id
SELECT id, site_id, material_id, supply_id, operate_date, sl_kg,dj,yfdj, zje,type as detail_type FROM `hte_kc_material_all`
